events.message: I received my order today but unfortunately one of the items is broken. The screen has a large crack and it doesn't turn on anymore.
The issue described involves a broken product received by the customer, categorizing this as a product defect case.
An agent from the product support team has been assigned to assist with the reported broken item.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the cracked screen on your item. Let me help you with this issue right away.
Could you please provide some photos of the cracked screen and the packaging it arrived in to help us assess the damage?
Here are the pictures you requested showing the damage to the screen and the box it came in. Let me know if you need additional information.
Thank you for the photos. We will arrange a replacement to be sent to you immediately and provide a prepaid label to return the defective item.
I appreciate the quick response and the replacement offer. Looking forward to receiving the new item soon.
The replacement has been processed and a shipping confirmation email will be sent shortly. The case is considered resolved from our end.
We are checking in to ensure that you received the replacement item and that everything is working properly now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday in perfect condition and works great. Thanks for your help!
The case has been closed following confirmation of receipt and satisfaction with the replacement product.
